Package exengine.engineservice

Class CreateExService

java.lang.Object
exengine.engineservice.CreateExService
@Service public class CreateExService extends Object
Service hub responsible for building and delivering explanations.

  • Method Details

    • getExplanation

      public String getExplanation(int min, String userId, String device)
      Builds context-specific explanations for home assistant. This function determines the causal path behind an explanandum and presents an appropriate, context-dependent explanation. Refer to the paper for details.
      Parameters:
      min - Representing the number of minutes taken into account for analyzing past events, starting from the call of the method
      userId - The user identifier for the explainee that asked for the explanation @Note not to confuse with the id property of the user class
      device - The device whose last action is to be explained
      Returns:
      Either the built explanation, or an error description in case the explanation could not be built.

    • getExplanandumsLogEntry

      public LogEntry getExplanandumsLogEntry(String device, ArrayList<LogEntry> logEntries)
      Transform the explanandum's device name to the exact LogEntry describing the explanandum. The output is the latest entry of the Home Assistant logs that is a known action, and is associated to the provided device. In the context of this application, this is necessary for two reasons: 1. In Home Assistant, a single physical device may be associated to various Home Assistant entities which have their own id's (e.g., a device "lab_fan" may have the entities "sensor.lab_fan_current_consumption", and "switch.lab_fan"). 2. The determination of the causal path of an explanandum relies on it's representation as an entry of the Home Assistant logs.
      Parameters:
      device - name of a device, or "unkown", if no particular device is provided
      logEntries - the list of Home Assistant logs
      Returns:
      the action that is to be explained

    • getLogEntries

      public ArrayList<LogEntry> getLogEntries(int min)
      Fetches (or when in demo, retrieves) a list of most recent log entries from Home Assistant.
      Parameters:
      min - number of minutes, denoting the maximum age of the fetches log entries (ignored when in demo mode)
      Returns:
      a list of log entries that are no older than min, starting from when this function is called.

    • loadDemoEntries

      public ArrayList<LogEntry> loadDemoEntries(String fileName) throws IOException, URISyntaxException
      Loads demo entries from a json file and stores them in a list of LogEntry objects, ready for usage.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of json file
      Returns:
      Throws:
      IOException
      URISyntaxException
